overview: Brio & LGB, Marx Train layout, Marx side-dumping car, warning about crossing the tracks. Stop, Look and Listen. Real steam engines - the Norfolk & Western J and the Southern Pacific Daylight. Show and tell - what signals mean. Signal Lights. About electric engines. About diesel engines. About flat cars and the popular dinosaur segment featuring the Dino Express Song. Take the Dinosaur test when the train stops, you name the dinosaur. Ain't It Great to be Crazy? Buster the engineer drives too fast. Jeff tells how steam engines are identified. Old McDonald Had a Train. Standard gauge and O gauge. Classic Ives, Lionel and American Flyer Standard gauge trains are featured Blue Comet, Stephen Girard, State Set, Hiawatha, Mayflower, and the extremely rare White Ives set. A steam engine takes a bath. Many different real steam engines. How steam engines operate, about a Shay locomotive. Down at the Station. Lionel and AF Barrel Loaders in action.
title: I Love Toy Trains: Parts 4-6
